lst.name: sentence
lst.str: 2) If the average of the daily market indicator prices over six months prior to a review is below (or above) the lower intervention price (or the upper intervention price), the reference price will be automatically revised downwards (or upwards) by five pct unless the International Natural Rubber Organisation council decides on a higher percentage.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Legal drafting of provisions will start next week and formal adoption of the new accord by the 40 countries taking part in the conference is expected to take place on March 20.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Xuto said: "I welcome the friendly and cooperative atmosphere that has prevailed without interruption" since the talks began last Monday.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: 2) If the average of the daily market indicator prices over six months prior to a review is below (or above) the lower intervention price (or the upper intervention price), the reference price will be automatically revised downwards (or upwards) by five pct unless the International Natural Rubber Organisation council decides on a higher percentage.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Legal drafting of provisions will start next week and formal adoption of the new accord by the 40 countries taking part in the conference is expected to take place on March 20.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Xuto said: "I welcome the friendly and cooperative atmosphere that has prevailed without interruption" since the talks began last Monday.
